content: So in summary, our revised fiscal year 2022 guidance is as follows: net sales of $890 million to $920 million which is an increase from the $860 million to $890 million last communicated; adjusted EBITDA of $110 million to $114 million which, as I said, was unchanged from previous guidance; adjusted net income of $52.8 million to $56.4 million which is an increase from the $50.7 million to $53.3 million, last communicated; adjusted diluted earnings per share of $1.30 to $1.39 which is an increase from the $1.25 to $1.32 in our last guidance; and an adjusted effective tax rate of 26% to 27% which is an improvement from the 29% to 31% assumed in our prior guidance for the full fiscal year.
